scenario.name: REGISTER multiple contacts
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[service]@[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] Max-Forwards: 70 From: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:[service]@[remote_ip]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:5060>;+sip.instance="<urn:uuid:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000001>";q=1.0 Contact: <sip:[service]@[local_ip]:5061>;+sip.instance="<urn:uuid:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000002>";q=0.5;expires=120 Expires: 3600 Content-Length: 0
